parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets material of object selection. The selection number is defined through the [[CfgVehicles_Config_Reference#hiddenSelections | hiddenselection]][]<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>{} array in the vehicle's config (starting with 0).

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> obj '''setObjectMaterial''' [selectionNumber, material]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> obj: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [selectionNumber, material]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> selectionNumber: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> material: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>car [[setObjectMaterial]] [0,"A3\Structures_F\Data\Windows\window_set.rvmat"];
car [[setObjectMaterial]] [1,"A3\Structures_F\Data\Windows\window_set.rvmat"];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[getObjectMaterials]], [[setObjectTextureGlobal]], [[getObjectTextures]], [[setObjectTexture]], [[setObjectMaterialGlobal]]
</value></part></template>
